story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Heritage Guiding was founded with a simple mission: to transform how visitors experience Stockholm's rich history. We believe that understanding the past enriches our present and inspires our future.
story.paragraph2: Our team of expert guides brings together decades of experience in history, art, and archaeology. Each tour is crafted to provide not just information, but genuine connection with the stories that shaped this beautiful city.
story.paragraph3: From the cobblestone streets of Gamla Stan to the magnificent halls of the Royal Palace, we invite you to discover Stockholm through the eyes of those who love it most.

terms.description: Terms and conditions for using HeritageGuiding services

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to HeritageGuiding. These terms and conditions govern your use of our website and services. By booking a tour or using our services, you agree to these terms.

booking.title: Booking Terms
booking.intro: When you make a booking with us:
booking.point1: You must be at least 18 years old to make a booking
booking.point2: All information provided must be accurate and complete
booking.point3: Booking confirmation is subject to availability
booking.point4: You are responsible for arriving at the meeting point on time

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Full payment is required at the time of booking. We accept major credit cards, Swish, and bank transfers. All prices are in Swedish Kronor (SEK) unless otherwise stated and include applicable taxes.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.intro: Our cancellation policy is as follows:
cancellation.point1: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before the tour start time

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: While we take every precaution to ensure your safety, participation in tours is at your own risk. HeritageGuiding is not liable for personal injury, loss, or damage to property except where caused by our negligence.

conduct.title: Tour Conduct
conduct.point1: Follow the guide's instructions at all times
conduct.point2: Behave respectfully towards other participants and public spaces
conduct.point3: Not engage in illegal activities during the tour

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on this website, including text, images, and tour materials, is the property of HeritageGuiding and protected by copyright law.

law.title: Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by Swedish law. Any disputes will be resolved in Swedish courts.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at info@heritageguiding.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.content: HeritageGuiding is committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This policy explains how we handle your personal data.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This privacy policy explains how HeritageGuiding collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services.

dataCollected.title: Information We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We may collect the following information:
dataCollected.point1: Name and contact information (email, phone number)
dataCollected.point3: Payment information (processed securely through our payment provider)
dataCollected.point4: Website usage data through cookies and analytics

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.point2: Communicate about your tours and any changes
dataUse.point3: Improve our services and website experience

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with trusted service providers who assist in operating our business, always under strict confidentiality agreements.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.point2: Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
cookies.point3: Marketing cookies for personalized content (with consent)

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the right to:

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy, or as required by law. Booking data is typically retained for 7 years for tax purposes.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer.
